events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund as the size I ordered doesn't fit me at all and I no longer need the item.
The customer's request for a refund due to sizing issues has been categorized under Refund for further processing and assistance.
Support agent Sarah M. has been assigned to handle the refund request and assist the customer with next steps.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and specify if the item has been used or washed? This will help us process your refund faster.
My order number is 5879204. The jacket is brand new; I haven’t worn or washed it at all since I received it last week.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process for your order 5879204. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great. I appreciate the quick help and will wait for the return label email to send the jacket back.
The refund process has been set up, and the return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the full refund will be issued promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the return label and that the jacket has been shipped back to us.
Yes, I got the label and returned the jacket yesterday. Thank you for following up!
We have received your returned jacket and the refund has been successfully processed. You should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for contacting support. We are closing this case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
